Returns a single Brand. Optional filter parameters can be passed in.

Authorization

blocks.data: Returns a single *Brand*. Optional filter parameters can be passed in.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Products | modify | `store_v2_products` |
|  Products | read-only | `store_v2_products_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

brand_id.description: The ID of the `Brand` to which the resource belongs.

include_fields.description: Fields to include, in a comma-separated list. The ID and the specified fields will be returned.

exclude_fields.description: Fields to exclude, in a comma-separated list. The specified fields will be excluded from a response. The ID cannot be excluded.

data.description:
Brand Response returns for:
* Create Brand
* Get Brand by Id
* Update Brand by Id
data.title: Brand Response

name.description:
The name of the brand. Must be unique.
Required in POST.

page_title.description: The title shown in the browser while viewing the brand.

meta_keywords.description: Comma-separated list of meta keywords to include in the HTML.

meta_description.example: Common Good is a modern brand.

search_keywords.description: A comma-separated list of keywords that can be used to locate this brand.

image_url.description: Image URL used for this category on the storefront. Images can be uploaded via form file post to `/brands/{brandId}/image`, or by providing a publicly accessible URL in this field.

custom_url.description: The custom URL for the product on the storefront.
custom_url.title: customUrl_Full

is_customized.description: Returns `true` if the URL has been changed from its default state (the auto-assigned URL that BigCommerce provides).

meta.description: Empty meta object; may be used later.
meta.title: Meta

data.description: Error payload for the BigCommerce API.

title.description: The error title describing the particular error.

data.title: Not Found
